jds.title: Senior Python Developer
jds.text: We are looking for a Senior Python Developer with 5+ years of experience in Python development. The ideal candidate should have strong knowledge of Python fundamentals, data structures, and advanced Python concepts including decorators, generators, and memory management. Experience with frameworks like Django or Flask is a plus.

jds.title: Java Backend Engineer
jds.text: Join our team as a Java Backend Engineer. We need someone with solid Java fundamentals, understanding of object-oriented programming, exception handling, and Java collections. Knowledge of Spring framework and multithreading is preferred.
